data.name: The Iron Oath Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The Iron Oath Original Game Soundtrack, composed by Alex Roe, contains 48 tracks written for the Early Access release of The Iron Oath. Journey from Westmire to the Redlands with orchestral music showing the vast world of Caelum, filled with epic battle themes and songs that depict each country and its cities. This is no ordinary medieval fantasy soundtrack, the world of The Iron Oath is a land of song, rich in melody and waiting to be discovered!
data.about_the_game: The Iron Oath Original Game Soundtrack, composed by Alex Roe, contains 48 tracks written for the Early Access release of The Iron Oath. Journey from Westmire to the Redlands with orchestral music showing the vast world of Caelum, filled with epic battle themes and songs that depict each country and its cities. This is no ordinary medieval fantasy soundtrack, the world of The Iron Oath is a land of song, rich in melody and waiting to be discovered!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 307 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1251 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: High Quality is WAV
